org.cripac.isee.vpe.util

Class Singleton<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cripac.isee.vpe.util.Singleton<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Singleton<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class Singleton manages singletons of any types.
    Author:
    Ken Yu, CRIPAC, 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Singleton(Factory<T> objFactory)
      Create a singleton manager of specified class T, and update the instance by default.
      Singleton(Factory<T> objFactory, boolean toUpdateInstance)
      Create a singleton manager of specified class T.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Singleton

        public Singleton(Factory<T> objFactory)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a singleton manager of specified class T, and update the instance by default.
        Parameters:
        objFactory - Factory to create new instance of class T when instance of it does not exist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On failure creating a new instance.

      • Singleton

        public Singleton(Factory<T> objFactory,
                 boolean toUpdateInstance)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a singleton manager of specified class T.
        Parameters:
        objFactory - Factory to create new instance of class T when instance of it does not exist.
        toUpdateInstance - Whether to update the instance in the pool on create of this manager.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On failure creating a new instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getInst

        public T getInst()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Get an instance of class T.
        Returns:
        A singleton instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On failure creating a new instance.
